title: How to Have a Good Time With Your Hamster

steps.headline: Use toilet paper rolls or rolled up blankets that hamsters can go through.
Be sure to use their hamster ball!
Wear a hooded sweatshirt and let them ride in the hood.
Get tubes and ladder (a seesaw would do) to play with your hamster.
Let it run around in an enclosed space.
Feed it strawberries, grapes and or cheese and watch them gobble away for a nice, delicious treat!

text: Use toilet paper rolls or rolled up blankets that hamsters can go through. They love this. Be sure to use their hamster ball! (let it in there maximum 30 mins.)
